heading: Why Loopring?
subtitle: Loopring is an Ethereum Layer-2 scaling protocol. It allows anyone to build high-throughput, non-custodial AMMs and orderbook-based exchanges, and payment applications on Ethereum by leveraging Zero-Knowledge Proofs.

features.title: Secure
features.explain: Loopring is an open-sourced, audited, and non-custodial exchange and payment protocol, which means nobody in the Loopring ecosystem needs to trust others. Cryptoassets are always under users' own control, with 100% Ethereum-level security guarantees.

features.title: High Throughput
features.explain: Loopring powers highly scalable decentralized exchanges and payments by batch-processing thousands of requests off-chain, with verifiably correct execution via ZKPs. The performance of underlying Ethereum is no longer the bottleneck.

features.title: Low Cost
features.explain: Loopring performs most operations, including order-matching and trade settlement, off the Ethereum blockchain. Such a design dramatically reduces gas consumption and thus overall settlement cost to only fractions of comparable on-chain cost.
